title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Rodgers Playoff Disappointment and Divisional Round Reaction with Aqib Talib
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Rodgers Playoff Disappointment and Divisional Round Reaction with Aqib Talib
description:
Colin reacts to a wild NFL Divisional Round weekend, including Tom Brady's Buccaneers narrowly losing to the Los Angeles Rams (3:00), the epic Josh Allen-Patrick Mahomes shootout (9:00), and why Aaron Rodgers has no one to blame but himself for the Packers disappointing home playoff loss to the Niners (16:00). Then, Super Bowl champ and host of the Catchin' Fades podcast Aqib Talib joins Colin to react to the Bills/Chiefs thriller, the absence of Tyrann Mathieu (26:00), the record-setting performance from Gabriel Davis (27:00), why it's so tough to face an Andy Reid-coached team (29:00), takeaways from the Rams/Bucs clash (31:00), what it's like to be coached by Sean McVay (33:00), reasons behind Aaron Rodgers and Packers losing to the 49ers (39:00), and the advantage Joe Burrow has over other QBs (41:00). 

Make sure to Subscribe and follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
